c74object.name: filter.chebyshev1
c74object.digest: Nth-order Chebyshev Type-I filterThis object is intended mainly for plotting
c74object.description: Nth-order Chebyshev Type-I filterThis object is intended mainly for plotting. For audio filtering, see filter.chebyshev1~.

method.name: float
method.digest: Stream of numbers to be filtered
method.description: Stream of numbers to be filtered.

attribute.name: ripple
attribute.digest: Acceptable passband ripple in magnitude response
attribute.description: Acceptable passband ripple in magnitude response.

attribute.name: response
attribute.digest: Response or shape of the filter
attribute.description: Response or shape of the filter.

attribute.name: bandwidth
attribute.digest: Width of the band in Hz for bandpass and bandstop filters
attribute.description: Width of the band in Hz for bandpass and bandstop filters.
